title: JavaScript
details: JavaScript is a versatile programming language commonly used in web development. It allows for interactive and dynamic web pages.
learning_steps: Introduction to JavaScript syntax and data types

title: ReactJS
details: ReactJS is a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces, especially for single-page applications.

title: Vue.js
details: Vue.js is a progressive JavaScript framework used for building user interfaces and single-page applications.
learning_steps: Introduction to Vue and the Vue Instance

title: PHP
details: PHP is a widely-used open-source scripting language especially suited for web development and can be embedded into HTML.
learning_steps: Introduction to PHP syntax and variables

title: Python
details: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its readability and broad applicability in various fields.
learning_steps: Introduction to Python syntax and data types

title: HTML & CSS
details: HTML and CSS are the foundational technologies for building web pages. HTML provides the structure, while CSS defines the style.
learning_steps: Introduction to HTML elements and structure

title: C Programming
details: C is a powerful general-purpose programming language that is widely used for system programming and developing operating systems.
learning_steps: Introduction to C syntax and data types

title: C++
details: C++ is an extension of C that includes object-oriented features. It is widely used for software development and game programming.
learning_steps: Introduction to C++ syntax and data types

title: Networking
details: Networking involves the practice of connecting computers and other devices to share resources and information.

title: Machine Learning
details: Machine Learning is a branch of artificial intelligence focused on building systems that learn from data and improve their performance over time.

title: Databases
details: Databases are structured collections of data that are managed and queried to support various applications.

title: Data Structures
details: Data Structures are ways of organizing and storing data to enable efficient access and modification.
learning_steps: Arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues

title: Algorithms
details: Algorithms are step-by-step procedures or formulas for solving problems, essential for computer programming and data processing.

title: Operating Systems
details: Operating Systems manage computer hardware and software resources and provide common services for computer programs.

title: Cybersecurity
details: Cybersecurity involves protecting computer systems and networks from information disclosure, theft, or damage.
